SELECT A.USER_SEQ, A.EMAIL, A.PASSWORD, A.USER_NO, A.USER_NM, A.USER_TEL, A.USER_HP, A.USER_FAX, A.USER_BIRTH, A.USER_SEX, A.ENTRY_YMD, A.QUIT_YMD, A.POSI_CD, A.DUTY_CD, A.DEPT_CD FROM TB_USER A WHERE A.USE_YN = 'Y' AND A.DEL_YN = 'N'
AND UPPER(A.EMAIL) = UPPER(#{email})
SELECT A.REF_TOKEN FROM TB_USER A WHERE A.USE_YN = 'Y' AND A.DEL_YN = 'N' AND UPPER(A.EMAIL) = UPPER(#{email})
